overview: Tom is in his mid thirties and experienced many setbacks in his life. Recently, he has fallen in love. "Charming, funny…“ is how he describes his crush. But one day: silence. His calls and texts remain unanswered. To come over his frustration and anger his mother advises him to talk to a priest. Reluctantly, he follows her advise and goes to a church for confession.
title: The Confession
